properties.displayName: Process Monitor Driver Creation By Non-Sysinternals Binary
properties.query:
DeviceFileEvents
| where (FolderPath contains "\\procmon" and FolderPath endswith ".sys") and (not((InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\procmon.exe" or InitiatingProcessFolderPath endswith "\\procmon64.exe")))

tags.name: description
tags.value: Detects creation of the Process Monitor driver by processes other than Process Monitor (procmon) itself.
